review: Overall I would put the software as 100 but the hardware just isn't up to par the Amazon Stick can't keep a clear signal. I've upgraded my router and  internet speeds for streaming but the stick either can't find the signal or the streaming suffers. The funny thing is I get full bars of WIFI on my phone outside, right behind the wall were the stick is. Yes it will work well if the TV were closer to the Router but that's not how my house is set up (For those saying get a stronger router see previous sentence). I've been through two sticks already (The stick would drop the connection randomly until finally it wouldn't connect to WFI no matter the distance). If an new one comes out with better connection capabilities I'd be willing to try because despite the issue it does have some pretty solid apps that are easily navigated.
